website_summaries.verdict: This fun snow tube is twice as thick as most competitors and built to last.
pros: Available in several cool designs, including a unicorn and flamingo
Inflates in seconds with unique valve
cons: The thick material makes it a bit heavy to carry, and it feels stiff when you fold it

customer_reviews.title: I imagine this is what riding a real unicorn is like.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I was not going to write a review for this, as it was more of a joke buy, but after 3 days of drinking and sledding on this colorful creature, I am impressed. It took a beating, held in all of its air, and is FAST on the snow. I imagine this is what riding a real unicorn is like.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe David

customer_reviews.title: Big size, heavy duty construction made it a hit for the adults, as well as the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and well made. My son said he was not going to ride a pink flamingos down the hill when we went sledding, that quickly changed when the other 2 sleds didn't last more then 3 times down the hill. The flamingo was nice and big, made out of heavy duty pvc, not cheap and flimsy. It also comes with a nice repair kit just in case. It was a lot of fun big enough for adults and the kids. Overall it was hilarious and fun riding a flamingo down the hill.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: More fun this way!
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVED IT!!! It added that extra excitement with playing in the snow. I think it also helped the younger kids want to give sliding down a hill a try. It could be a little scary at first for toddlers, but ours couldn't get enough. It held up the weather, we had no problems there. It inflated and deflated fast. And we were able to fit 2 adults on at a time. We didn't do it often, but we did do it and had no problems. I'd gladly order more products from this company. I can't wait to try out summer floats
customer_reviews.author: Eshe

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! VERY DURABLE - Buying more for next year
customer_reviews.text: I had so many compliments on this when I had a float trip in Missouri. People were amazed by how much it was hit by random objects in the water and still made it through when a lot of other floats didn't. :) It is VERY DURABLE and I highly recommend buying these floats!
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyNCo

customer_reviews.title: Cute and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Great ride today on our unicorn snow tube! Everyone loved the speedy ride and cute design. It stayed inflated and held up to even two adults flying down the hill.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Hospitalized with near death injury over speed and lack of control
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing to give a warning to users. She flies. I mean flies!!!!!!! I’ve been in the hospital for 10 days now and many more to come. I couldn’t slow down or turn and I went Mach 5 down the snow hill and hit a post . I could have died. I have a shattered kidney with multiple lacerations. I. Glad it was me and not my child. Through all that, she did not pop. I, on the other hand had to be airlifted to London to a trauma hospital. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: DrKJ

customer_reviews.title: This thing FLIES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tube last year, but only got around to using it this year. If you're looking for a tube sled that's cute, holds air well, and sends you whizzing down the hill at rapid (and I do mean RAPID speed), then look no further! Holy toledo, does this thing send you flying! I went sledding with a buddy, and from the first push off, I was gone baby gone. It's durable, and it keeps the air in with no problems. I love my unicorn tube sled, I will be having a lot more fun adventures in the winter with this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Took our granddaughter out and we had a great time. It was 30 degrees out and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Took our granddaughter out and we had a great time. It was 30 degrees out and the sled handled the cold and the snow. It is big. If we were going to be out more than a few hours I would recommend some way to add air to it. We inflated it at home which made it harder to transport and then it did lose a little air by the time we left. So if traveling make sure you have a way to inflate on site and if you are out more than a few hours you might want to be able to add more air.
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase they don’t inflate!
customer_reviews.text: I was really Excited based on the reviews and it never fully inflated, and would completely deflate within 30 minutes. The odd part is I would have assumed there was a hole (mind you I hadn’t even used it yet), the other tube I ordered (the polar bear), did the same thing! So I bought two flat intertubes my kid was super excited to use just to find out we’re tubeless and all the tubes are sold out st the stores due to heavy snow and consumer purchasing so all the kids are sledding and we have no tubes. Such a bummer!!
customer_reviews.author: Health nut

customer_reviews.title: A winter must have!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took this late in the spring so the snow was crunchy but this held up like a champ. All my friends had to ditch their tubes to try out the snow dragon. Let's just say they were all wanting to get one for themselves after taking this beast for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Season Campbell

customer_reviews.title: BEST SNOW PURCHASE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this snow tube for our month long, snowy Colorado adventure. My 4 year begged every single day to use this float! It’s very durable, quite easy to blow up as long as you have a foot pump or electric pump and a blast to ride. My young son and I easily fit on it together. We had so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got it for fun in the snow, but it took a while before it got to see snow. Because my 3 year old is into dragons we ordered this model. It actually lives in our living room at the moment as "pet dragon" that she rides to whatever kingdom strikes her. It's very sturdy to all sorts of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: simone

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and hoed several kids at a time.
customer_reviews.text: So we purchase the Ice dragon and we were going to the snow the next day problem was we didn't find any snow so we have already been using it for the last month for the summer in the swimming pool the kids love it and even the neighbor kids love it. They've had 4 and 5 kids on the time on top of it it's awesome. If it gets ruined when we go to Palm Springs will buy another one for sure. Thanks for the ice dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinkiddos

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money cause I bought it 12 months ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last one outing. Was losing air the minute I blew it up, figured maybe I didn't have he valves tight. But soon enough I had a hole. I'm 160 lbs and took no jumps with this tube. Though a fairly heavy gauge, not the right material for me. A total waste of money cause I bought it 12 months ago and never opened it up till now.
customer_reviews.author: JohnyD56

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily, but great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, kids loved it, but developed a tear on the bottom within 5 minutes of use. Ended up using duct tape to patch rather than waste the one patch they give you. Would definitely buy something similar if the bottom was made of something like rubber instead of plastic, don’t see this lasting all winter. But while it does the kids are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Pedsdoc

customer_reviews.title: Popped after three trips down the hill.
customer_reviews.text: Got a hole after 1 day of use. My daughter was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic feels pretty good and thick. These tubes are extra fast on the slopes compared to hard plastic and foam sleds, so you have to be extra aware of your surroundings before you decide to use this tube.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great tube!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew who is young and will be going sledding with his dad. Both fit great on the sled. Very easy to deflate but will definitely need a pump to inflate based on the size
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tube for floating
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to float with some friends down a creek/river and it was amazing. Keeps your butt off the rocks and floats real well. The unicorn was also a hit. I'm 6'3 and roughly 200 lbs and the tube was plenty big enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: GME

customer_reviews.title: Popped but company replaced it free of charge!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter,The second time down the hill it popped.Very light weight material and looks like it is more made for floating in the water vs. snow tubing. Got it for my daughter for Christmas and did not use it until last weekend. Too late to return it! VERY disappointing. Update: The company Replaced this no questions asked! Changed my rating from a 1 to 5 we are very satisfied! The customer service was above and beyond what I expected!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product - so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my first review on Amazon after 10,000 purchases, lol. I gave this to my daughter for a weekend getaway up in the mountains. She loved it, but also the 15 dads and daughters that came too. It was the hit of the weekend as everyone from dads to daughters to every combination rode it down the mountain, over jumps, through trees, etc. over the course of three days. Other sleds and toboggans were left at the bottom. It still looks brand new. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute snow tube
customer_reviews.text: Very cute snow tube for my three-year-old granddaughter. My daughter-in-law will also use it when they go up to the lake in the summer. Seems very sturdy but unfortunately here in Chicago we had 60 degree weather on Christmas and was not able to use it. Large enough for an adult to ride and also.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Just pass on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Nope! Just pass on this one. The handles ripped off on the first run. And all the air when poof. The Jasonwell has held up well. Go with one of theirs. I returned it and got another Jasonwell.
customer_reviews.author: BJS

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, great for summer as well
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought it for the summer. Great floaty for the beach. Very sturdy. Can't wait to use it in the wintertime as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monika - Customer Happiness Manager

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids had a blast last winter on these sliding down hill. Adults can slide on them too! They can also be used in the water, very durable. You do need an air pump to blow it up though.
customer_reviews.author: suziq_07

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My eight and ten year old used this to slide down our small front yard hill. After an hour it started to deflate and we found 2 holes on the underside on the tube. I would not recomend this product unless you plan on very limited use in light powder snow with a small child.
customer_reviews.author: Melo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Rediculous
customer_reviews.text: The description doesn't make highlight that a pump is not included. Generally when you get something of this size one is always included. Intead you have to wait for it to arrive and then they tell you to use a pump, without identifying what kind of pump - or they say we can blow it up by mouth (!) which would easily take about an hour. In calling Amazon product support it turns out that you need an air mattress pump. So if you don't have one around the house you have to make an extra trip to purchase the pump. Bottom line is that they make this product seem cheaper by not including a necessary component.
customer_reviews.author: RCS

customer_reviews.title: This is a FANTASTIC tube!
customer_reviews.text: First tube to make it through a snow season and pool season. Nice size... sturdy, and comfortable if you lay your head back on the unicorns head. Really loved this tube until my niece through it out of the pool onto a flag pole and punched a hole in it. I think I can fix it... but up until then, first tube I had to make it through two strong seasons. I don't fault it for the hole... I will charge my niece for that one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tim C. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This snow tube was so much FUN and was the highlight of our day! Even our 200+ men enjoyed some runs. Very very durable and cute. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MISHMANKA

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Gave it for Christmas. . . Do not open b4 SNOW! Grand kids (2) had a BLAST!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Tracy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tube and a A-DUDU Snow Tube and the Penguin was MUCH faster and easier to get a track started. The Penguin has held up to a good amount of use so far, and it is large enough for adults but also easy for my 11 year old son to use. Just be careful, because it does go fast!
customer_reviews.author: Deucestrutter

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fast, high quality, sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: We got the unicorn inflatable. It went faster and farther than all other tubes at the park. EVERYONE, asked where we got it. My six-year old granddaughter rode it by herself and with her dad. My 6’2” 210lb husband took it down the hills several times. So much fun. Very durable and cushioned seat. We loved it so much we ordered the ice dragon for next time so we don’t have to wait for others to back up the hill!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnetta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and good and reliable company
customer_reviews.text: We have the Unicorn and the Polar Bear. Living in Wisconsin can be hard, with all that cold and snow, but with these snow tubes we had lots of fun during this winter. I have three kids and they never want to ride their plastic sledge again... The ride on the snow tubes cannot be compared to that. It fast and smooth, and hours of fun! We had a small problem with the bear, but the manufacturer made it right. They have wonderful customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Full Time Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fast and durable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fastster than we had thought and the ride is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Family

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality even after getting replacement
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this cute snow tube before our trip to Tahoe and upon arriving blew the tube up (noticed that it wouldn't blow up normally- it had a weird bend in the middle of the float) slide down hill twice and it started loosing air. Got a replacement and exact same thing happened. Wont bother buying from this company again- disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki W

customer_reviews.title: I 5 years old daughter just love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, good quality, nice colors, very comfortable. She uses her Unicorn as a day bed laying down with her blanket and watching the Tv. Sturdy and good quality. Air inside stays for a long time. Nice. Thank you for including the patch kit. Price is also ok, Delivered on time nicely packed in a box. I got her for Xmas. Thank you!!!! If she's happy I am also happy :)
customer_reviews.author: kasiak

customer_reviews.title: winter fun
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift, so i have no idea how it held up
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: 2nds the Best
customer_reviews.text: This was the second unicorn snow tube we bought for our daughter as the first one didn't survive two rides down the hill. I am pleased to say that this one did not disappoint! We have used it several times now and it is durable, fast, and leaves a little girl giggling the whole time down the hill. We hope that we get many more snowy days with this tube.
customer_reviews.author: kml

customer_reviews.title: The Grandkids Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to put them in the snow, but as soon as I blew them up the grandkids jumped in and claimed them to be their new "comfy" chair! The only issue is the air inlet needs a flap because air pours out until you get the plug in correctly.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Penguin is super cute, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to use on the snow. Purchased for our 10yr old but the whole family loved it. Held up a few hours until it finally popped. Maybe the kids hit a rock or a branch. Who knows. All I know is we all loved it and will be purchasing another this year for our snow trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle Cracks
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 8 yr. old granddaughter for Christmas. After a couple uses the handle cracked and leaks air. It's now 5 days past the return date. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: We’re off to candy mountain Charlie
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had so much fun with this goofy snow tube. Got a bunch of crazy looks and laughs from my neighbors. Worked great during the recent Seattle snowpocalypse. No holes thus far and numerous times we got going so fast we went off the snow onto the street and skidded for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: icode4food

customer_reviews.title: Nice but deflates alot in the cold...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the tube hits the outside, it starts to deflate. Tried it out once. Looking forward to seeing if it does the job on bigger hills. I'd recommend buying a different brand for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait till we use it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had other ones like this, but not as cute. I hope it holds up! When summer comes I'm taking it to a private beach and use it in the water. I do not like lake water so with this I can stay out of the deep water and float around. Don't care what people will think, I just know that I will have fun floating.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Just find a used semi-truck tire tube
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brand of Amazon snow floats in the $30 range. They're all just junk. The first one started a leak when it was just laying on my carpet for my kid to sit on and watch TV. The second one popped the third time in the snow. Time to start looking for a gigantic semi truck tire tube.....
customer_reviews.author: Black Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool !!!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had much snow this year to see how well this thing really holds up but so far we are pleased. Definitely the coolest tube on the block. I was worried that it would be a thiner material like a pool floaty but it's not. It is much thicker. Cant wait for a foot or more of snow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Super fast sled. Develops holes fairly quickly
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun. Much faster than any of our other sleds. Has a tendency to develop small holes where the material creases, so it didn't last long. Fun few days though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: Best snow tube ever. Have even used it on the lake a few times this summer. The looks I get are hilarious, I wish I could have a whole fleet of unicorn tubes
customer_reviews.author: S.Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: We used a funnel from the kitchen and a blow dryer on the cool air setting to inflate. Works out well. I was a little worried because it looks like it deflates when we brought it out into the cold. But no worries, it worked great or like my daughter said "this is awesome".
customer_reviews.author: Its all heart

customer_reviews.title: This inflatable was awesome! (I actually bought this one and the penguin) ...
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable was awesome! (I actually bought this one and the penguin) The kids loved it for going down the slopes and all the other kids at the hill were asking to try it. The unicorn got a slow leak and Gofloats customer service was amazing and easy to deal with - we had a new inflatable shipped out to us free of charge within a few days (after showing our receipt). Summer is here now and we can't wait to try them out on the lake!!
customer_reviews.author: tracey perozik

customer_reviews.title: Great In The Snow!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Large enough for an adult, but my three year old can hold the handles. Seems durable enough, and moves fast in the snow! My daughter feels safer riding in this then she did with a traditional sled. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and can fit an adult and child at the ...
customer_reviews.text: These tubes were a HIT for our sledding party this season. They are sturdy and can fit an adult and child at the same time. They are also slick on the snow so be prepared for a fast ride down the hill.
customer_reviews.author: BER

customer_reviews.title: good luck if has pin hole
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother, pin hole, cost me $14.43 to return Amazon only gives $4 back! I want seller to return my $14.43 in it's entirety!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but it popped
customer_reviews.text: Man, this thing can go fast. Really enjoyed it but on the first snow with it, it popped. Pretty big tear on the bottom, though we are gonna patch it and keep using it (hopefully) I think it should be known that it did pop when we crashed into a tree. It is kinda hard to control and roll off of. Don't recommend for small children on large hills. Overall, the fun we had with it was worth the $30 or so we spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Cassity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son and daughter-in-law who have 1 toddler. It’s big enough for adult and child, and having it be an animal makes it extra fun. We get a lot of snow, so it will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: If you want the kids to be jealous buy this.
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate it higher I would. All the kids always pointed at “Drogo”, my ice dragon. I live in Mass so I brought out this bad boy during the summer and for the winter. Best purchase! Only popped because we took it out on a not-so-clear sledding area. Will repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome snow tube, super fast fill and tough and durable outer exterior! Definitely makes the plastic disks and sled goers jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Popped the First Day
customer_reviews.text: This popped pretty easily when a small adult jumped into it but it was fine while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Eck

customer_reviews.title: Works great appears very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Seems to be very durable. You have to inflate it a lot but it gets sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Howard

customer_reviews.title: she loved it! for the hour it was put to ...
customer_reviews.text: she loved it! for the hour it was put to use...it hit a bench and popped. guess this is to be expected with an inflatable tube!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thick material for price paid (got a good deal with Amazon warehouse). Used on the lake. Very comfortable. Used the bears head as head rest.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Snow Tube
customer_reviews.text: This snow tube is fantastic. It is very fast on hills, but also very sturdy and easy enough for my four year old to safely hold on herself and stay in comfortably. On snowy days with lots of powder, this is able to make a path when other sleds just get stuck, but it also great for well groomed trails too. I can't say enough good things about this tube.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Eastman

customer_reviews.title: We love these. Was Christmas gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: We love these. Was Christmas gift for kids. They slide great, go forever farther than any other sleds/tubes and super fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Anngel

customer_reviews.title: The talk of the hill.
customer_reviews.text: It is very large it fits up to 3 smaller children on it. All the kids at the sledding hill wanted a turn on it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hertziger

customer_reviews.title: The material and design on this product are great! It has a thick layer on the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The material and design on this product are great! It has a thick layer on the bottom side for stronger lasting and top part as well. I had so much fun on the snow with friends. I didn't have any problems with keeping the air pretty much all day. It was a smooth ride all day with no problem on comfort-ability at all. I used it on Mt. Hood in Oregon on a 100 foot high hill.....It was the best slide ever using this tube. I really enjoyed it and money well spent. You can use it as a chair to take your break while eating. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: vm

customer_reviews.title: Not easily inflated
customer_reviews.text: Valve didn't fit bicycle pump. Had to be inflated with lung power.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren were so excited to receive these for Christmas. They are actually large enough for a parent to ride with the small ones. The plastic is heavy duty and holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fun Christmas gift for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My five year old granddaughter loved this. On its first use, it ran over a stick and popped. The replacement is on its way. Couldn't be happier with the wonderfully quick and positive response.
customer_reviews.author: Loralee Norris

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn flying!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for the whole family! Biggest hit on the snow hill!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vigueria

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Got a hole pretty easily first day. Came with a patch.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: Really fun. Used our car pump. Kids loved it. Survived numerous collisions.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality! Very easy to fill with a shop vac or pump. My 9 year old niece and 35 year old husband were sledding for hours and they held their air nicely. I think there were even some forays into Thorn bushes that had no effect on the tubes integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews before purchase; Most were really happy with the product and I couldn't agree me. We have already been to the snow several times and this tube has been amazing every time!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great but says you can inflate with a hairdryer - I tried and there’s no way. I had to blow it up the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a river tubing trip and it met expectations, was very sturdy and comfortable...and also very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: We LOVED these things! Used in snow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Dragon for my husband and the unicorn for myself - and they were the talk of the slopes! Fast, fun, and kind of hilarious! Excellent quality. Need an air mattress pump to inflate them, however. What you use to blow up tires will not suffice FYI
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D'Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: BEST THING EVER. EVERYONE SHOULD HAVE THIS. It is so funny and all ages can enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Was a lot of fun and is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Was a lot of fun and is very durable! We slid across a few concrete patches many times, and still was air tight. Please make a panda next!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it! Fun on the snow and in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it! Fun on the snow and in the summer on the water slide!
customer_reviews.author: B Woods

customer_reviews.title: Held up well after tubing for 1 hour. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Held up well after tubing for 1 hour. We let it deflate and come to room temperature in the car and saw 4 holes in the bottom. I think I'll need more patches.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to repair but worth the fun.
customer_reviews.text: EPIC- We used these on snow and yes they will POP and they do take repair well. Be prepared to repair but worth the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Mikeworth

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.text: It hasn’t snowed here yet, but I know the kids are going to love theses.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my Niece
customer_reviews.text: This snow tube is made of strong material and my niece loves the design and colors of the Unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: lorilori11

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Tube is built well of strong plastic and endured countless runs by my son and I. With proper use there's no reason this won't last for years.
customer_reviews.author: KL54KL

customer_reviews.title: it is huge so i recommend an electric pump
customer_reviews.text: this thing is durable. it is huge so i recommend an electric pump. stayed inflated the whole time we were sledding. worked for a 6 year old and adults
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Snow day fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best way for a family to go sledding!! Flying down a mountain! It's like an air ride. We couldn't get enough I only wish I bought more. Held two adults so 300lbs had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Goss Jr

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a kid again!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I used these for the our first snow tubing experience and they were so much fun!! They were perfect size for us chunky adults and held up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley kotlarz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far and it looks so cool. Yay for unicorns!
customer_reviews.author: Shanti Devi

customer_reviews.title: Durable & great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability of this! We bought for a seven year old but we were easily able to do two adults on this. So fun! Goes fast and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: mrschopperj

customer_reviews.title: Pops very easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and took them sledding-Popped in 10 minutes!! :( awful!!! Way too expensive for something so cheap. Only used on powdery snow and my husband and I are around 150lbs so it was really upsetting that we had to go home after they popped.
customer_reviews.author: brittany sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: They really are as big as they look in this picture! Took a long time to blow up!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it... the air came out of it several times.. I have absolutely no idea why. I did not see or hear a leak..
customer_reviews.author: Joe Casasanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big for Adult use.....
customer_reviews.text: Durable for a 220pound individual. Great for Snow. No complaints, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: The product it's self is amazing ! But I was a little upset that it was shipped in the box with the photo on it (no additional packaging) as it was a gift and there was no guessing what was in the box that was on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Should have paid attention to reviews about durability
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 20 seconds on first run down hill. Huge gash on underside and not repairable. Threw in trash.
customer_reviews.author: RClarke

customer_reviews.title: As pictured. It is large. I purchased for ...
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. It is large. I purchased for the pool and the dog to ride in.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Hard to inflate
customer_reviews.text: How are you supposed to inflate this?! We tried all the techniques they said and eventually gave up and blew it up manually. Made for a very dizzy morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It literally got a hole in it after the first trip down the hill. Use it for the pool
customer_reviews.author: Jeff York

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: On the first use it has a hole on it already!
customer_reviews.author: E. Posey

customer_reviews.title: Popped first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: This was very cute and kids were excited to use it. It popped a hole in the tail the first time we took it out and we were unable to use a patch to fix it because the hole was on a seam. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Solberg

product_meta.title: GoFloats Winter Snow Tube - Inflatable Sled for Kids and Adults (Choose from Unicorn, Ice Dragon, Polar Bear, Penguin, Flamingo)
product_meta.description: GoFloats already revolutionized the inflatable pool toy market, and now we're doing the same with winter snow tubes! Our fun designs are meant to turn heads, but also provide a reliable and fully functional sledding tube for riders of all sizes. We use premium cold weather materials that are 100% thicker than the leading economy brands so you'll have a sled that lasts more than once going down the hill! Each sled has 2 built in handles for stability and has an extra high center 'seat' so your bottom never hits the ground. These are a must have for enjoying some winter fun!
feature_bullets: SNOW DAY: Perfect for sledding down snowy hills in style
COLD WEATHER TREATED: Our material is 100% thicker than the competition to make for awesome designs that are both fun and functional
RAPID-INFLATE VALVE: Unique Go Floats valve inflates in seconds so you're ready for the snow in no time
Always use with adult supervision on a designated sledding hill
